title: boosting links
body: People are sending me these weird links for boost, saying that is cheap at the moment. Like what is up with that, i'm afraid that i might get a virus if i click on the link. So basically i'm wondering if i can get a virus by clicking on those links. always is what the are saying legit.

replies.body: Definitely be cautious about sites or offers that aren't from our official site.  They may be malicious sites and spam, so your best bet would be to block them right away.  If the message is coming from a friend, you may want to let them know or[ submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to us in case their account may have been compromised.  Thanks for letting us know about this!
